named-query.name: findUserByUsername
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.username = :username

named-query.name: findUserByNicknameAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.username = :username and u.encryptedPassword = :password

named-query.name: findTopUserByWins
named-query.query: select u from UserEntity u where u.username like :username

named-query.name: findSavedGameInfoByUsername
named-query.query: select g from GameInfo g where g.username = :username and g.status = :status

named-query.name: findGameInfoByDateTime
named-query.query: select g from GameInfo g where g.dateTime = :dateTime
